price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߊ߯ߘߌ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߞߏ ߘߐ߫ ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߝߢߐ߫ ߞߏ߬ߣߟߊ߬ߡߊ ߗߋ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߞߊߡߊ߬
arabic: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلۡعَقِيمَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wafī ʿādin idh arsalnā ʿalayhimu al-rīḥa al-ʿaqīma
